text: can you help me with youtube links on how to create a website on HubSpot? I really need a reference.
When i first started using HubSpot, I searched youtube for good tutorials and didnt find much.  Would love to see an official HubSpot developer youtube channel!
me too
how to create a template for HubSpot? I really need to get rid of the locked footer and header.
any chance that you could help me with this?
in the drag and drop template builder?
i dont know if you can remove them.  I would create a template from file and then you could
<@U38EZFVFE>, <@U7SL518D6> may know better, though.
<@UEEK9N43Z> you can get rid of them. try swap module? i often leave them, and just hide via CSS
doesnt it automatically create 3 divs? header-container-wrapper, body-container-wrapper, footer-container-wrapper
i guess you could remove via javascript(or hide with css), but i dont think there is a way to get rid of them through the template builder (if that is the question)

you cannot remove the header and footer divs generated by the drag and drop template builder from within the template builder. you could use CSS to hide them or use javascript to strip them out. You could also convert the drag n drop template to a coded template if you had to.

<@UEEK9N43Z> - Two things to check out:
> 1) If you haven't seen it already, check out the HubSpot CMS Developer Discovery Kit: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/discoverykit>
> 2) <@U3PKJ8EQL> recently launched x2 lessons (templates and modules) in HubSpot Academy that you'll find helpful: <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/learning-center/tracks/34> - there will be x2 more lessons (HubL and HubDB) added soon and x2 more in Q1 2019
hey <@U22PKFRU5> will that developer track turn into a full fledged dev certification? or will it remain as tracks?

Long term it will likely turn into a certification. But will stay a track until make sure to have the right content/testing criteria in place. We want to make sure that if we're awarding a CMS Developer certification, it really means something and sets a high bar to attain.
right on. thanks!
Hi All, Would like to ask what are the list of certifications I can take that are related to HubSpot developers? Thank you in advance
You can filter the certs by type and select designer
the DEV one is coming soon i think
cool, thanks <@U38EZFVFE>
